name: @chris-lally/ui
description: CLI and distribution entrypoint for @chris-lally/ui workflows

scripts.build: pnpm exec ts-node src/bin/lally-ui.ts registry export --out public/r && pnpm exec tsup --config tsup.config.ts && rm -rf dist/templates dist/public && cp -R templates dist/templates && cp -R public dist/public
scripts.registry:export: pnpm exec ts-node src/bin/lally-ui.ts registry export --out public/r
